name: SurfRadio
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: surf radio
des:
Surf Radio now plays the biggest hits from the 80s, 90s, 2000s and selected new tracks, plus a few classic old favorites that we know are appreciated by our local audience. The website also hosts local podcasts and information of interest about The Hua Hin and Royal Coast of Thailand area. 
Surf Radio News is broadcast at 30 minutes past the hour, every morning: Monday - Friday 7-9am.
Covering local, national and regional headlines.

The Breakfast Show with Leigh Higgins features a bright morning mix of Great songs and lively fun chat with fresh guests dropping in for a chat with Leigh most mornings. 
The station is a real window on the beautiful area it serves and is one of the most popular stations of its kind in South East Asia.

Rick Dees Weekly Top 40 Classic Editions from the 80s / 90s can be heard on the station every Saturday at Noon (local Thai Time) and on Wednesday Evenings from 8pm til Midnight. 

Bill Paige hosts Weekday Drive and Enda W. Caldwell formerly of International station Atlantic 252 hosts Weekend Drive Sundays 2pm-6pm.

Surf Radio aims to grow listener numbers and continue building trust within the local community with a long term commitment to Hua Hin and the Royal coast.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
